author: stephenwu
msg: assertion project updates -- subject and generic attribute discovery

author: mattcoarr
msg: compilation problem showed up in SubjectAttributeClassifier on the line that calls DependencyUtility.getPathToTop().  that method doesn't exist.  so i commented out the for loop that depends on calling this method.
i am temporarily disabling the SubjectAttributeClassifier by commenting out the calling code in AssertionAnalysisEngine.

author: mattcoarr
msg: the assertion module is now working with both EntityMention and EventMention annotations (both are subclasses of IdentifiedAnnotation, though there are other subtypes that are not handled by the assertion module).
previously, only EntityMention annotations were handled.

author: mattcoarr
msg: removed commented out code that is no longer needed
